snippet.title: Crossing to the Cold Valley TRAILER
snippet.description:
Coming to Windows, iOs and Linux November 10.

Crossing to the Cold Valley is a short, linear story that leads you through a small corner of a rich and dying world.

https://carrotcakestudios.itch.io/coldvalley
